lines.text: There isn't a yard of guts in this whole town. This isn't a town, it's a trained dog act! I'm tired of gettin' pushed around! One way or another I'm gonna get myself a couple of murderers tonight.

[Referring to Cisneros' accusations]
Ben, you're not going to take this seriously?
They pay me to take things seriously.

[Firmly]
Look, in this office I'm the judge of that, and let's not forget that!

[to Renchler]
You can push your wetbacks and your white trash around all you want, but don't try it on me.

[Threateningly to Renchler]
Mud don't care who it splashes on!
What will happen to Spurline without the business from the ranch?
What'll happen to it without the law?
